attributes.action: Prevent the closure of the Brixham Tourist Information Office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brixham TIC is under threat of closure and instead, possible in a supermarket, it will be replaced by a rack oo pamphlets.
The TIC has been an invaluable resource for the town, both for tourists and locals. We can purchase theatre tickets, tickets for attractions all over the South West, possible further. The staff are very helpful. 
They are always willing to answer all questions, put up posters for local events, and answer any query. Thier local knowledge is outstanding. As there are steps up to the office they also come out to those in wheelchairs
The only thing it needs is to be moved to an accessible building, and there are some empty buildings in the town which are suitable.
The next nearest TIC is in Paignton, which is not always convenient to get to, especially for the elderly and disabled

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
